mapper.insert: insert into sardine_zone ( uuid, code, name, wrhuuid, wrhcode, wrhname, note, companyuuid ) values ( #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrh.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrh.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrh.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
